item.description: Happy Thanksgiving Everyone! This Holiday Season let's be Thankful for our Four Legged Best Friends with a little extra TLC. Sunday November 20th from 11am-1pm we will have Fun Games & Activities to Entertain our Pooches. The pups can try a game of Duck Duck Turkey, Pilgrim Paw Painting, and Harvest the Corn. We are also accepting donations of gently used pet supplies, bag or canned food & treats for local pet shelters. Hope to see you all there! Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
item.name: Thanksgiving Celebration!
